page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES TONYREFAIL
page.content: {Cabbage My best game is cabbage.The game goes like this. You have a ball and when you say cabbage everyone has to stop and then you throw the ball.If it hits someone they are on it. {Moving Targets The bell goes for playtime.Kevin gets his tennis ball and we all tramp out to play.We all decide to play moving targets.Whoever is on it has got to hit all the other people who are playing with the ball.The people who are not on it have got to stay against a wall and are only allowed to move back and fore across the wall. {Naughty Children The idea of this game is one person is the mother and the rest are children.The children run away from the mother.When the mother catches a child the child is on it.
